MFA_SETTINGS.TITLE: Two-Factor Authentication
MFA_SETTINGS.SUBTITLE: Secure your account with TOTP-based authentication
MFA_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Add an extra layer of security to your account using a time-based one-time password (TOTP)
MFA_SETTINGS.STATUS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your two-factor authentication settings and backup recovery codes
MFA_SETTINGS.STATUS_ENABLED_DESC: Your account is protected with an additional layer of security
MFA_SETTINGS.ENHANCE_SECURITY_DESC: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security by requiring a verification code from your authenticator app in addition to your password.

SETUP.STEP1_TITLE: Scan QR Code with Your Authenticator App
SETUP.STEP1_DESCRIPTION: Use Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP-compatible app
SETUP.ENTER_CODE: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
SETUP.ERROR_STARTING: MFA not enabled. Please contact administrator.
SETUP.SUCCESS: Two-factor authentication has been enabled successfully

BACKUP.TITLE: Save Your Backup Codes
BACKUP.DESCRIPTION: Keep these codes safe. Each can be used once if you lose access to your authenticator
BACKUP.IMPORTANT_NOTE: Save these codes in a secure location. You won't be able to see them again.
BACKUP.CONFIRM: I have saved my backup codes in a secure location and understand that I won't be able to see them again

MANAGEMENT.BACKUP_CODES_DESC: Generate new codes if you've lost or used your existing ones
MANAGEMENT.DISABLE_MFA_DESC: Remove two-factor authentication from your account

DISABLE.TITLE: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
DISABLE.DESCRIPTION: You'll need to enter your password and a verification code to disable two-factor authentication.
DISABLE.ERROR: Failed to disable MFA. Please check your credentials.

REGENERATE.TITLE: Regenerate Backup Codes
REGENERATE.DESCRIPTION: This will invalidate your existing backup codes and generate new ones. Enter your verification code to continue.
REGENERATE.NEW_CODES_DESC: Your old backup codes have been invalidated. Save these new codes in a secure location.
REGENERATE.CODES_IMPORTANT_NOTE: Each code can only be used once. Save them before closing this window.
REGENERATE.SUCCESS: New backup codes have been generated

MFA_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Two-Factor Authentication
MFA_VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Enter your verification code to continue
MFA_VERIFICATION.ENTER_OTP_CODE: Enter 6-digit code from your authenticator app
MFA_VERIFICATION.ENTER_BACKUP_CODE: Enter one of your backup codes

HELP_MODAL.TITLE: Two-Factor Authentication Help
HELP_MODAL.AUTHENTICATOR_DESC: Open your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.) and enter the 6-digit code shown for your account.
HELP_MODAL.BACKUP_DESC: If you don't have access to your authenticator app, you can use one of the backup codes you saved when setting up 2FA. Each code can only be used once.
HELP_MODAL.CONTACT_DESC_CLOUD: If you've lost access to both your authenticator app and backup codes, please reach out to Chatwoot support for assistance.
HELP_MODAL.CONTACT_DESC_SELF_HOSTED: If you've lost access to both your authenticator app and backup codes, please contact your administrator for assistance.
